TopicTitle: Sector 7 Space Laboratories - The Elcano Challenge Preparations

Articles.Content:
Starting with a Fuel Support Craft that I had picked from a couple I made (The Seahawk One) which can travel nearly halfway around Kerbin without carrying any extra fuel tanks, I felt this one may suffice.

This was testing which was done to ensure the Tanks will couple with the Craft, very time consuming but necessary

http://i.imgur.com/nQcdup8.png' alt='nQcdup8.png'>

Any tips before I begin this Journey would be appreciated, I don't think anyone would want to make this trip more than once!

Edited August 29, 2015 by castille7
